title: Crystal & glass chandeliers
description: Classic glass & crystal chandeliers from Italy in many sizes. From high-end chandeliers festooned with lead crystal, Asfour and Swarovski crystal pendants, faucets, pendalogues and octagons, to affordable glass and acryluc chandeliers.
